name: Caerphilly Cheese Festival
description: Wales's cheesiest celebration returns for a fantastic weekend of live music, great food and a whole load of fun in the shadow of Britain's second-largest castle. The Caerphilly Cheese Festival transforms the town centre with food, drink and craft stalls, a funfair, and street entertainers. Three live music stages host over 25 acts across the weekend: The Green Lady Stage, Castle Moat Stage, and the impressive Leaning Tower Main Stage. Sample the famous Caerphilly cheese alongside local producers, hot food concessions and craft stalls. Dog-friendly with a sensory sanctuary for those who need a quieter moment, this free-entry festival offers something for everyone.
